results.content: The instructor is a bit hard to understand and the closed captioning is auto-generated  instead of pre-scripted, so it doesn't always display correctly. He also moves a bit quickly through the content so I have to pause and take notes. It's nice that he compares the two (LESS and SASS) at the end.

results.content:
As a beginner, its great course, to learn about less and sass from scratch ie, how to add less/sass file, how variable works etc.
thanks

results.content: Great course that was easy to follow. The only improvement I can make would be to have the starter projects included so that students can follow along with what is being shown and then try some of it themselves without having to create their own example project.
results.content_html: Great course that was easy to follow. The only improvement I can make would be to have the starter projects included so that students can follow along with what is being shown and then try some of it themselves without having to create their own example project.

results.content: I liked this course and the professor explained very well, I recommend.
results.content_html: I liked this course and the professor explained very well, I recommend.

results.content:
Very high-level introduction to LESS and SASS. An overview of what LESS/SASS is used for with some quick examples.
Not engaging (with heavy accent) and I would need to do some other courses if I want to use SASS on practice.
Sorry to say but any money spent on it would be a waste.
